name: Lost - Demo
description:
Follow the story of the friends Backpacker and Tear, who set out on a new adventure and unfortunately gets lost along the way. Based on the comics of Rob Cham.

http://robcham.com/lost-1

Gameplay

In the demo, play as the Backpacker and traverse through hand-crafted levels and use your puzzle-platforming skills to progress the story. Experience hybrid features like endless  running and more unique ones in the future.

Keyboard Controls Move/Push Left of RightA / DJumpSpace / K / W SlashJ Misc Info

A collaborative project between Ateneo de Naga University - DACA Department, Polysplit Games and the Comics Creator, Rob Cham.
Adapting comics into games initiative by GDAP, SIKAP, and Komiket.
